EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-03-13 Turbonomic 6.3.Thanks for joining us - Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining {{my.Webinar Title:default=Our Webinar}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining our webinar on {{my.Webinar Title:default=The Webinar}} and for bearing with us during our audio challenges at the end.
You can watch it again on-demand here <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-whats-new-wbn/]]>.
If you haven't done so already, please install Turbonomic 6.3 <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-1292-how-to-perform-a-turbonomic-offline-update-latest-links-included]]> or reach out to your CX rep to learn more about our latest product release.
We hope you enjoy the recording! -Team Turbonomic
